Success is defined as the following without errors:
 * time cif_crontool -p hourly -d -P
 * time cif_crontool -p daily -d
 * time cif_smrt ...
 * cif -d -M -q google.com
 * time cif_feed -d
 * time cif -M -d -q infrastructure/scan -c 85
